contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 6 兴趣爱好 Interests and Hobbies
场景对话
面试官史密斯先生在询问求职者杰克的兴趣爱好。

contents.title: 史密斯：现在我们来谈谈你的兴趣爱好吧。
contents.answer: Smith: Now let's talk about your interests and hobbies.

contents.content: Jack: Well, I like reading, walking, swimming, hiking and playing basketball.

contents.title: 史密斯：你的生活倒是多姿多彩。
contents.answer: Smith: You have a colorful life.

contents.content: Jack: Yes. These hobbies have indeed enriched my life.
职场达人小技巧    兴趣爱好如何说    工作面试中的所有问题都是为了判断“你是个什么样的人”，以及你这样的人是否符合职位当前和未来的要求，有关你的兴趣爱好和业余时间安排的问题也不例外。

contents.title: 史密斯：那么，下班后你通常都做些什么？
contents.answer: Smith: How do you usually spend your time after work?

contents.content: Jack: I prefer to read novels with a cup of tea.

contents.title: 史密斯：最吸引你的是什么书呢？
contents.answer: Smith: What kind of books interests you most?

contents.content: Jack: Detective books.
表面上是了解你的业余爱好，实则是考查你的爱好是否会影响到你的正常工作，回答时应尽量避免说：“我除了工作，没有什么爱好。”这可能意味着你性格孤僻，也可能让人觉得你是在说假话。

contents.title: 史密斯：看来你是个富有想象，又有逻辑思维的人。
contents.answer: Smith: You seem to be a man of imagination and logic.

contents.content: Jack: To some extent, I regard books as my good companion.

contents.title: 史密斯：如果这样的话，你会受益多多。
contents.answer: Smith: If so, you can benefi t a lot from them.

contents.content: Jack: That's for sure.
也要避免随意回答：“我喜欢跳舞、唱歌、看球赛。”那样可能会使人立即想到你是个“舞迷”、“歌迷”和“球迷”，可能会影响工作。最好是回答有时会读书、听音乐、养花、练书法和参加体育活动等。
必背例句

contents.title: 他有很多爱好，例如唱歌、游泳、打篮球。
contents.answer: He has many hobbies, such as singing, swimming and playing basketball.

contents.content: 2.She is quite fond of travelling.
她很喜欢出游。
3.She likes listening to classical music for entertainment after work.
她工作之余的消遣是听古典音乐。
4.She always has a cup of coffee when she has to stay up late.
熬夜时，她喜欢喝一杯咖啡。
5.He likes climbing mountains, but he doesn't like hiking.
他喜欢爬山，却不喜欢远足。
6.How do you usually entertain yourself after a day's hard work?
结束了一天的辛苦工作后，你通常有什么消遣？
7.As for entertainment, she enjoys watching movies.
若说消遣，她喜欢看电影。
8.He enjoys surfi ng the Internet on weekends.
周末他喜欢上网。
9.Reading novels in the evening can help her relax.
晚上看小说可以让她放松自己。
10.She likes reading very much, but she doesn't like reading on rainy days.
她很喜欢读书，却不喜欢在下雨天读书。
核心词汇总

contents.content: to some extent在某种程度上

contents.hanyi: n. 同伴，志趣相投的人
